name: Reverb (Clouds)
description: This algorithm implements the reverb and diffuser parts of the Clouds module by Ã‰milie Gillet. The diffuser is a simple network of all-pass filters which 'smears' the sound slightly, turning a mono source into something that sounds stereo.
use_cases: Creating spatial effects in mono signals
Adding natural-sounding reverb to audio tracks
gui_description: Contains controls for diffuser mix, reverb time/diffusion/low-pass filtering, input gain, and routing parameters (input/output buses). Includes a sample rate selector between 'Native' and 'Authentic (32kHz)' modes.

input_ports.name: Left_input
input_ports.description: The left audio input bus (1-28). Defaults to bus 1.

input_ports.name: Right_input
input_ports.description: The right audio input bus (1-28). Defaults to bus 2.

output_ports.name: Left_output
output_ports.description: The left audio output bus (1-28). Defaults to bus 13.

output_ports.name: Right_output
output_ports.description: The right audio output bus (1-28). Defaults to bus 14.
